text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Aha, we've arrived at 『Sakurajima』! 
I see it looks powerful, as befits 
one carrying the name of 『Sakura』!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Is it not fate that those as wonderful
and powerful as us are given the name
Sakura?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
According to Chiyono O-san, This Island
is famous for its active volcano…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Ah!! I remember hearing this somewhere! 
The ashes from the volcano fertilize the 
soil, allowing Sakura flowers to bloom!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
And thus『Sakurajima』……! It all makes
sense now――, It's a Bakushin-like
excellent reasoning!!
